messages.message: Other thing: in Build when running an App, it would be useful to have more download options in addition to CSV and Excel. Specifically a txt file or Doc. Now that we have more OCR options, we know from search traffic volumes that "Batch OCR PDF" is an important high demand search. Doing this with an app is a great approach, but should give one the ability to download the results of a run in a txt file (like is possible in Converse)
